QuestData.Title: Taking the Overlook Back
QuestData.Description: There is only one way for us to take Largo's Overlook back.$b$bI think you know what we need to do $n. Largo is pretty paranoid these days so you should be able to find him on top of the tower, looking for his imaginary navy to finally arrive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Gray has asked you to kill Commander Largo at Largo's Overlook. The overlook is just northeast of the base camp.
